name: Wii BRSAR Audio Archive
summary: A BRSAR file is a sound archive used by select Nintendo Wii games such as Super Smash Bros. Brawl and Mario Kart Wii. It contains multiple audio files, such as .WAV , .MP3 files, .BRSEQ files, or .BRSTM files, used for sound effects, music, and Wii audio streams.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
